page.title: 16MILL FARM
page.content: MILL FARM IT WAS BUILT IN 1855 AND HAD BARNS ADDED TO IT IN 1892. MR. BUCKLE HAS BEEN FARMING FOR FORTY-FOUR YEARS. HE GROWS 75% CEREAL CROPS, WHICH ARE USED FOR ANIMAL FOODS,AND 25% VEGETABLES,CONSISTING OF BEANS, POTATOES,BRUSSEL SPROUTS,CABBAGES,CAULIFLOWERS AND LETTUCES. THE CROPS ARE GROWN IN ROTATION-THAT IS CEREAL,GREENS, CEREALS,POTATOES. HE DOES NOT KEEP ANY ANIMALS EXCEPT CATS TO CATCH THE MICE. MR. BUCKLE HAS A COMBINE HARVESTER, TWO TRACTORS,PLOUGHS, A SEED-PLANTER, SCUFFLER OR ROTAVATOR AND A HARROW. SOME OF HIS FARM IS ALONGSIDE THE GREAT OUSE. HIS FARM IS NOW UP FOR SALE AND HE IS RETIRING.
